verses.text: I said, I will take heed \w to|strong="H1732"\w* \w my|strong="H1732"\w* ways, \w That|strong="H1732"\w* I sin \w not|strong="H1732"\w* \w with|strong="H1732"\w* \w my|strong="H1732"\w* tongue: I will keep \w my|strong="H1732"\w* mouth \w with|strong="H1732"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* bridle, While \w the|strong="H1732"\w* wicked \w is|strong="H1732"\w* before me.

\w I|strong="H5704"\w* \w was|strong="H6310"\w* dumb \w with|strong="H6310"\w* silence, \w I|strong="H5704"\w* held \w my|strong="H8104"\w* peace, \w even|strong="H5704"\w* \w from|strong="H5704"\w* good; \w And|strong="H1870"\w* \w my|strong="H8104"\w* sorrow \w was|strong="H6310"\w* stirred.
My heart \w was|strong="H3511"\w* hot within me; While I \w was|strong="H3511"\w* musing \w the|strong="H2896"\w* fire burned; \add Then\add* spake I \w with|strong="H2896"\w* my tongue:

\w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*, \w make|strong="H1197"\w* \w me|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* know \w mine|strong="H1696"\w* end, \w And|strong="H3820"\w* \w the|strong="H1696"\w* measure \w of|strong="H3820"\w* \w my|strong="H1696"\w* days, \w what|strong="H1696"\w* \w it|strong="H1696"\w* \w is|strong="H3820"\w*; Let \w me|strong="H1696"\w* know how frail \w I|strong="H3820"\w* am.

Behold, \w thou|strong="H3045"\w* \w hast|strong="H3045"\w* \w made|strong="H3045"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \add as\add* handbreadths; \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* life-time \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w as|strong="H3117"\w* \w nothing|strong="H4100"\w* \w before|strong="H3117"\w* thee: Surely \w every|strong="H3117"\w* \w man|strong="H3045"\w* \w at|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* best estate \w is|strong="H3068"\w* altogether vanity. \qs [Selah\qs*

\w Surely|strong="H5414"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w man|strong="H3605"\w* walketh \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w vain|strong="H1892"\w* \w show|strong="H5414"\w*; \w Surely|strong="H5414"\w* \w they|strong="H3117"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* disquieted \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w vain|strong="H1892"\w*: \w He|strong="H3117"\w* heapeth \w up|strong="H5414"\w* \add riches\add*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* knoweth \w not|strong="H5414"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w shall|strong="H3117"\w* gather \w them|strong="H5414"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1980"\w* \w now|strong="H1980"\w*, Lord, \w what|strong="H4310"\w* wait \w I|strong="H3045"\w* \w for|strong="H3045"\w*? \w My|strong="H3045"\w* hope \w is|strong="H4310"\w* \w in|strong="H1980"\w* thee.

Deliver \w me|strong="H4100"\w* from all \w my|strong="H6258"\w* transgressions: Make \w me|strong="H4100"\w* not \w the|strong="H6258"\w* reproach \w of|strong="H8431"\w* \w the|strong="H6258"\w* foolish.

\w I|strong="H7760"\w* \w was|strong="H3605"\w* dumb, \w I|strong="H7760"\w* opened \w not|strong="H7760"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* mouth; \w Because|strong="H3605"\w* \w thou|strong="H7760"\w* didst \w it|strong="H7760"\w*.

\w Remove|strong="H6605"\w* \w thy|strong="H6213"\w* stroke away \w from|strong="H6213"\w* \w me|strong="H6213"\w*: \w I|strong="H3588"\w* am consumed \w by|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* blow \w of|strong="H6310"\w* \w thy|strong="H6213"\w* hand.

\w When|strong="H3615"\w* \w thou|strong="H3027"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* rebukes dost correct man \w for|strong="H5921"\w* iniquity, \w Thou|strong="H3027"\w* makest \w his|strong="H5921"\w* beauty \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w consume|strong="H3615"\w* \w away|strong="H5493"\w* \w like|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* moth: Surely every man \w is|strong="H3027"\w* vanity. \qs [Selah\qs*

Hear \w my|strong="H3605"\w* prayer, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H1892"\w* give ear unto \w my|strong="H3605"\w* cry; Hold not \w thy|strong="H2530"\w* peace \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* tears: \w For|strong="H5921"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* am \w a|strong="H3068"\w* stranger \w with|strong="H5921"\w* thee, \w A|strong="H3068"\w* sojourner, \w as|strong="H6211"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* fathers \w were|strong="H5921"\w*.

Oh spare \w me|strong="H5973"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w may|strong="H3068"\w* recover strength, \w Before|strong="H5973"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w go|strong="H3068"\w* hence, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w no|strong="H3605"\w* \w more|strong="H3588"\w*.
